# HUD::ALLOW_DISPLAY_OF_MULTIPLAYER_CASH_TEXT

## Parameters
* **BOOL** allow

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Controls whether to display 'Cash'/'Bank' next to the money balance HUD in Multiplayer (https://i.imgur.com/MiYUtNl.png)
